original_title: The Wonderful Story of Aisha, Ali and Flipflopi the Multicoloured Dhow Boat
overview: Aisha and Ali are unhappy about the plastic pollution in their otherwise idyllic Kenyan seaside village and decide to do something about it: collect all the plastic and make a big dhow sailing boat!
title: The Wonderful Story of Aisha, Ali and Flipflopi the Multicoloured Dhow Boat
